# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is truly exceptional and packed with features that exceed expectations. Given its quality and uniqueness, I believe it's worth more than its face value. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I propose a special introductory price of $85 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone like you who appreciates high-quality products. Don't miss out on this chance to experience the best we have to offer! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
